programme.title: A Year in Music

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Art
programme.desc: Het verhaal van de diefstal van de Mona Lisa in 1911 uit het Louvre en hoe Pablo Picasso ervan werd beschuldigd. Plus, de ongelooflijke verhalen over hoeveel andere werken van da Vinci verloren gingen in de geschiedenis.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Art
programme.desc: Tweehonderd jaar lang was Vermeer zo goed als vergeten in Nederland. Toen uiteindelijk de jacht op de meesterwerken van de verloren meester begon, verdiende een kunstvervalser ernorme bedragen.

programme.title: Attack of the Zombie Fungus
programme.desc: Schimmels worden over het algemeen gezien als de bodem van de voedselketen, de recyclers in de cirkel van het leven. Maar schimmels zijn roofdieren. En er zijn er meer dan ooit is gedacht.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Een team van wetenschappers begint aan een zoektocht om de mesopelagische zone, oftewel de oceaanschemeringzone, te verkennen die zich onder de oppervlaktelaag van de oceaan bevindt.

programme.title: The Beasts of Halloween
programme.desc: Over de hele wereld heeft 31 oktober een speciale betekenis: Halloween. Dankzij bijgeloof en tradities zijn veel diersoorten het symbool geworden van horror en bovennatuurlijke verschijnselen.

programme.title: The Beasts of Halloween
programme.desc: Over de hele wereld heeft 31 oktober een speciale betekenis: Halloween. Dankzij bijgeloof en tradities zijn veel diersoorten het symbool geworden van horror en bovennatuurlijke verschijnselen.

programme.title: The Moor
programme.desc: De film toont de biodiversiteit van deze vaak onderbelichte habitat en is een stille oproep om de laatste heidevelden intact te houden en te beschermen.

programme.title: Murder Maps
programme.desc: In de jaren dertig worstelt de ooit bloeiende industriestad Cleveland niet alleen met de Grote Depressie, maar wordt ze ook geteisterd door een brute seriemoordenaar. De pers noemt hem "De Slager van Kingsbury Run".

programme.title: Murder Maps
programme.desc: Een documentaire die aan de hand van verslagen van deskundigen en historische documenten de misdaden van Jack the Ripper reconstrueert die in 1888 de Londense wijk Whitechapel op zijn grondvesten deed schudden.

programme.title: Murder Maps
programme.desc: Een duik in de geschiedenis van de beruchte misdaden van Jack the Ripper, een van de meest beruchte seriemoordenaars aller tijden, die vijf vrouwen vermoordde in Whitechapel, Engeland.

programme.title: NASA's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Twee astronauten die gevangen zitten in het vacum van de ruimte staat een gruwelijke dood te wachten. De eerste close-upbeelden van Pluto laten een buitenaards landschap zien.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.sub-title: Coconut Shell Charcoal; Dial Indicators; Wet Downdraft Tables
programme.desc: We worden in het dagelijks leven omringd door voorwerpen die geproduceerd worden met zeer geavanceerde technieken. Ontdek hoe kokosnoothoutskool, meetklokken, natte afzuigtafels en fagotrieten worden gemaakt.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: We worden in het dagelijks leven omringd door voorwerpen die geproduceerd worden met zeer geavanceerde technieken. Ontdek hoe pasta, bosbessen, composttoiletten en overspanningsafleiders worden gemaakt.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: Het productieproces van hoekslijpmachines, doosjes voor bessen en omnidirectionele luidsprekers.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.sub-title: Cartridge Blades; Chocolate Banana Loaves; Vending Machines
programme.desc: De wereld waarin we leven staat vol voorwerpen die geproduceerd worden tijdens zeer verfijnde processen. Ontdek hoe scheermesjes, chocolade-bananenbroden, verkoopautomaten en duikcomputers worden gemaakt.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.sub-title: Cartridge Blades; Chocolate Banana Loaves; Vending Machines
programme.desc: De wereld waarin we leven staat vol voorwerpen die geproduceerd worden tijdens zeer verfijnde processen. Ontdek hoe scheermesjes, chocolade-bananenbroden, verkoopautomaten en duikcomputers worden gemaakt.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: Neem een kijkje achter de schermen bij verbazingwekkende fabrieken en ontdek hoe ultradun glas, palletdemontagemachines, cupcakes en naadloze roestvrijstalen buizen worden gemaakt.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: We worden in het dagelijks leven omringd door voorwerpen die geproduceerd worden met zeer geavanceerde technieken. Ontdek hoe potas, leren armbanden, wilde rijst en inbussleutels met L-sleutel worden gemaakt.

programme.title: Paranormal Declassified
programme.desc: Paul trekt door de bossen van het Amerikaanse Midwesten op zoek naar Bigfoot. Om het bestaan van dit mysterieuze wezen te bewijzen moet hij afrekenen met allerlei verzinsels en desinformatie.

programme.title: Paranormal Declassified
programme.desc: Paul onderzoekt een golf van demonische activiteiten waarmee de katholieke kerk in de VS wordt geconfronteerd. Zijn zoektocht brengt hem van Gary, Indiana naar Mineral Wells, Texas.

programme.title: Curse of the Bermuda Triangle
programme.desc: Vijf vliegtuigen van de Amerikaanse marine verdwenen spoorloos in de Bermudadriehoek, wat leidde tot veel speculatie. Velen geloven dat de Bermudadriehoek vervloekt is.

programme.title: Curse of the Bermuda Triangle
programme.desc: Een geloofwaardige getuige beweert het wrak van een lang verloren gewaand schip te hebben ontdekt. Experts starten een onderzoek om het vermiste schip te identificeren, en te verklaren waarom het zo ver verwijderd is van de plek waar het is gezonken.

programme.title: In Search of Monsters
programme.desc: Experts verkennen de Indiaanse legende van de Wendigo, waarbij ze onderzoeken of de verhalen over dit kannibalistische, zombieachtige wezen kloppen. De onderzoekers onthullen een gedurfde nieuwe theorie over de buitenaardse oorsprong van de Wendigo.

programme.title: In Search of Monsters
programme.desc: Experts onderzoeken schokkend nieuw DNA-bewijs waaruit zou blijken dat de ongrijpbare Yeti in Amerika rondwaart. Bovendien verkennen ze de theorie dat dit mythische wezen een buitenaardse oorsprong zou hebben.

programme.desc: The whole story starts here as Gordon Shumway, a Melmacian who escaped his planet before it was destroyed, crash lands into the garage of the Tanner family.

programme.title: ALF
programme.sub-title: Working My Way Back to You
programme.desc: ALF is relocated to the family garage as a result of his mischievous behavior. With Max Wright, Anne Schedeen.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF visits "Gilligan's Island" castaways Gilligan (Bob Denver), the Skipper (Alan Hale), the Professor (Russell Johnson) and Mary Ann (Dawn Wells).

programme.title: ALF
programme.sub-title: Take a Look at Me Now
programme.desc: Mrs. Ochmonek (Liz Sheridan) thinks she's seeing things when she spots ALF the alien in the backyard.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF joins a monastery after learning that his parents were married before he was born -- a disgrace on the planet Melmac.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: The Tanners become a TV ratings family, and ALF decides to rig the system so that his favorite program becomes a hit.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF becomes the star attraction at the Tanners' Halloween party. With Anne Schedeen and Andrea Elson.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF helps Lynn (Andrea Elson) boost her self-confidence by enrolling her in a beauty pageant. With Max Wright, Anne Shedeen and Benji Gregory.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF gets a severe case of hiccups after being excluded from Dorothy and Whizzer's (Anne Meara, Paul Dooley) wedding party.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: Willie and ALF hop on board a freight train in search of adventure.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF and the Tanner kids give Willie and Kate a second honeymoon.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: Kate dreams that she and ALF are rival presidential candidates. Political commentator John McLaughlin makes an appearance.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF is trapped in a box of toys going to a children's hospital.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF befriends the Ochmoneks' belligerent nephew (Josh Blake). With Max Wright and Anne Schedeen.

programme.title: ALF
programme.sub-title: ALF: S2 E14 - Can I Get a Witness?
programme.desc: When a football shatters the Ochmoneks' picture window, ALF gets the blame and he demands his day in Tanner Family Court.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF believes that he scared Willie's (Max Wright) uncle to death. With Ann Schedeen.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF lends a hand with the neighborhood block patrol and ends up confronting a prowler in the Ochmoneks' house.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: It's up to Willie to save ALF from the SWAT team surrounding the Ochomonek house, in which ALF had been chasing a prowler.

programme.title: ALF
programme.sub-title: We Gotta Get Out of This Place
programme.desc: ALF moves in with his blind friend, Jody, and learns some important lessons about life without sight.

programme.title: ALF
programme.sub-title: You Ain't Nothin' But a Hound Dog
programme.desc: ALF, jealous of the attention a stray dog is getting, gives the pooch to a mean old woman who claims to be the owner.

programme.title: ALF
programme.sub-title: Hit Me With Your Best Shot
programme.desc: Willie abandons his belief in pacifism after meeting the hostile father of the kid who has been bullying Brian.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: Willie has problems trying to sell the house because ALF keeps scaring off potential buyers with phony ghosts.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF's mail-order ventriloquist's dummy takes on a life of its own. Bill Daily and Fred Gross guest star.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: Kate's (Anne Schedeen) friend (Dorothy Lyman), a known drinker, sees ALF in the kitchen and thinks she's hallucinating.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF fantasizes that he reveals his existence to the world and serves as substitute host on David Letterman's show.

programme.title: The Den
programme.desc: A young woman studying the habits of webcam users witnesses a murder online and becomes the killer's next target.

programme.title: State of Emergency
programme.desc: Survivors band together after an explosion at a military bio-weapons plant turns most of their neighbors into flesh-eating zombies.

programme.title: Dementia
programme.desc: Hired as a live-in nurse, a seemingly sweet woman (Kristina Klebe) unleashes her dark side as she torments a Vietnam War veteran (Gene Jones) who has dementia.

programme.title: Magic
programme.desc: A neurotic ventriloquist's belief that his stage dummy controls his actions leads him to murder, madness and more.

programme.title: Wildling
programme.desc: After a childhood in captivity under the care of a man who taught her to fear the outside world, a young woman sees her new freedom shattered by a series of unsettling events.

programme.title: I Trapped the Devil
programme.desc: Hoping for a joyful family reunion, Matt and his wife pay a surprise visit to the home of his estranged brother, Steve, to celebrate Christmas. To their shock, they soon learn that Steve has a hostage in his basement -- a man he claims is the devil.

programme.title: Mischief Night
programme.desc: Emily, blind since a car accident killed her mother, has to protect herself and loved ones from an intruder.

programme.title: The Houses October Built 2
programme.desc: Still recovering from their abduction last Halloween, friends head back out on the road in search of the ultimate spooky experience.

programme.title: Infected
programme.desc: Seven strangers try to escape from Los Angeles after a strange virus that mutates humans is released.

programme.title: Trick
programme.desc: A detective tries to track down a masked killer who reappears every Halloween to wreak bloody havoc.

programme.title: Rent-a-Pal
programme.desc: A strange VHS tape allows a lonely bachelor named David to find companionship with Andy -- its charming and charismatic host. However, Andy's friendship comes at a cost, and David desperately struggles to afford the price of admission.

programme.title: All Hallows' Eve 2
programme.desc: A woman finds a VHS tape that shows a series of gruesome tales.

programme.title: Knives and Skin
programme.desc: In the wake of a high school student's mysterious disappearance, a collective awakening seems to overcome the town's teenage girls -- gathering in force until it can no longer be contained.

programme.title: Schitt's Creek
programme.desc: Johnny gets thrown into the raw milk business; Moira tries to connect with the townspeople; David gives style advice.

programme.title: Schitt's Creek
programme.desc: Moira is worried that racy photos from her past will jeopardize the campaign; Johnny asks for financial help; Alexis gets a job.

programme.title: Workin' Moms
programme.desc: Kate feels the true cost of having it all; Anne makes a huge family decision; Jenny tries to go back to her old life while Frankie tries to throw hers away.

programme.title: Workin' Moms
programme.desc: Kate is put to a working mom test; Jenny is forced to decide what she wants; Anne's family unites over a school project; Frankie tries to fix the unfixable.

programme.title: Workin' Moms
programme.desc: Back in 2005, Kate attends Anne's wedding where they encounter life-changing situations.

programme.title: Workin' Moms
programme.desc: Kate is fed up and sets out to get her job back; Lionel is convinced to get a vasectomy; Frankie thrives at the center.

programme.title: Workin' Moms
programme.desc: Kate mourns a family member; Anne and Lionel explore their newfound sex life; Frankie realizes she must leave the Wellness Center; Ian has a positive meeting.

programme.title: Strays
programme.desc: Max misunderstands Shannon's dating advice; Kristian lands an unexpected date because of Paul's loose lips.

programme.title: Baroness von Sketch Show
programme.desc: Groundhog Day; don't move to Hamilton; a helpful cult.

programme.title: CBC Winnipeg Comedy Festival
programme.desc: Comics Ivan Decker, Courtney Gilmour and Todd Graham discuss life's little complaints.

programme.title: Halifax Comedy Festival
programme.desc: Performances by Mike Wilmot, Sophie Buddle, Nick Beaton, Jason Cheny, Arthur Simeon, Erica Sigurdson, Chris Halef, Angelo Tsarouchas and Alex Wood.

programme.desc: Mr. Kim offers a gay discount; Mrs. Kim tries to find a cool, Christian-Korean boyfriend for Janet.

programme.desc: Mr. Kim and Janet compete to see who is the better photographer; Jung applies for a promotion and Mrs. Kim and Kimchee are surprisingly affected.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drunk man threatens both firefighters and the police. Police are called over a dispute regarding an alleged missing dog. A drunk driver changes his story when his friend is found pinned under his car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers engage in a high-speed pursuit of a stolen vehicle. Police spot a motel fire, alert the guests and contact the Fire Department. Officers pursue a suspect on a stolen motorcycle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect attempts to flee when officers tell him they will search him. Two men get in a fight over window installation. A hotel room is filled like a clown car with multiple suspects.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: When approached by police, a suspect decides to take his shirt off and taunt the officers. Twin sisters ask for help when their third sister is threated by her boyfriend. An intoxicated suspect crashes his wifes car into a light pole.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A defiant suspect winds up on the wrong side of a K-9 bite. A former fianc becomes a neighborhood nuisance when he pays his ex an unwanted visit. A routine traffic stop turns into warrants, pregnancy, and Meth.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A stolen vehicle investigation results in a brief foot chase and subsequent arrest. A driver is pulled over and is arrested for the possession of a controlled substance. While on patrol an officer spots an distressed man inside a vehicle with busted windows.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, officers stop to talk to a young woman who appears to be soliciting prostitution. A father accuses his son of breaking his jaw. While running from officers, a suspect attempts to drop evidence on the street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver takes several units on a reckless journey driving on the wrong side of the highway. Officers set up a reverse sting operation to capture a suspected drug dealer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two brothers after an attempted bank robbery. A confused man with a shotgun calls police after hearing voices. A man asks deputies for a break after they find illegal items in his truck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police use convenience store footage to make an arrest for burglary. Police attempt to help two neighbors reconcile their differences. Officers arrest a woman for domestic violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The occupants of a car with out-of-state plates try to conceal their identities. Officers investigate a vehicle lingering near a park known. An officer investigates a robbery at a truck stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: A Song of Fire and Cleaning
programme.desc: The pursuit of a criminal driver ends in a fire and police rescue. Police track down an elusive suspect. A family dispute over cleaning a garage ends with the police being called.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers dispatch the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspect who flees on foot. A suspicious male walking down the street is arrested with a large bag containing stolen goods and drug paraphernalia. A man is arrested in a stolen car containing drugs and a firearm.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police investigate a possible abduction at a trailer park. A man in a stolen truck is pulled over and Officers discover washed checks and drug paraphernalia. A suspect is arrested after abandoning a stolen vehicle behind a fast food restaurant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect attempts to discard drugs during a foot chase. A man fails to pull over for minor infraction and then bails out his car on foot. A man is arrested after being spotted in a drug transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are forced to taze a suicidal man for his own good. A familiar face makes cops chase him through a grass field. No lie is too big for a suspect who seeks refuge in a condemned house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police work a sting that targets drug dealers. An undercover sting discovers narcotics trafficking. Police respond to a burglary in progress and discover a flop house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Instead of facing the music, a suspect flees from officers down an embankment. A suspect takes a walk through the neighborhood with a BB gun. A innocent pedestrian gets more than she bargained for when shes hit in a two vehicle collision.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are assaulted by the brother of a suspect who is resisting arrest. A resident sprays water on his neighbors noisy dogs. Officers recover drugs and cash after pulling over a motorist.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer arrests a driver who attempts to swallow drugs stashed in his mouth. An officer arrests a repeated drug offender in an area notorious for drug trafficking. An officer pulls over an unlicensed woman driver who is arrested for providing falsified identification.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers break up a fight between a couple in the middle of the street. Not even a church is immune to being robbed. A dispute between neighbors involves deadly weapons.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man on the corner is questioned when hes wearing gang colors in a gang neighborhood. A muscle car spins its tires at a stop light. A womans neighbor steals her special plants.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high-speed chase ends when the suspect plays chicken with a concrete pole. An emotional man just wants the cops to give him a little kiss. A melee breaks out when a woman seizes her beau's cell phone.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple gets into a fight with their in-laws when they attempt to take their baby on a 3am drive. Two suspects proclaim their innocence after walking away from a hit and run. A man is attacked by his roommate after he gets too friendly with a woman in their home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers try to make sense of a store transaction turned wrestling match. An intoxicated woman calls the cops when her boyfriend tries to flush her late husband's ashes. A shirtless man with a nasty attitude defies officers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man fights with his wife over a haircut then leads police on a car chase. A woman gets violent with her boyfriend and then calls the police on him. An intoxicated woman tells deputies she only had two drinks.

programme.sub-title: I Won't Be There for You
programme.desc: A suspect foolishly tries to elude police in a bright yellow sports car. Roommates arent always there for each other when police are called to break up a fight. No one in a stopped vehicle wants to admit to ownership of contraband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman needs police help when her boyfriend threatens her with a knife. A zebra runs loose on the streets of Sacramento County. A man wants to use a stick and a rock to settle a dispute.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies are forced to tase a man after pursuing him into a field. A driver plays dumb when asked about the revolver under his car seat. Officers respond to two teenage girls in a fight.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man assaults another man for groping his girlfriend. Police make several drug-related arrests while patrolling New Orleans. An adventurous suspect is arrested while scaling down a drainpipe.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers stop a man riding a bicycle in the middle of the street with no backlight. Suspects have a fun night out in a neighborhood known for drugs. Officers are dispatched to help a woman when her boyfriend threatens her with a brick.

programme.desc: Deputies detain a man when a gun falls from his pantleg. Deputies are called when a father spits on his sons girlfriend. Officers respond when a child is bitten by two large dogs.

programme.desc: A dangerous pursuit between Officers and a known meth dealer ends in an arrest. A suspect with several felony warrants is apprehended without incident. A pursuit involving a stolen motorcycle exceeds speed of 100mph.

programme.desc: A stealthy robbery suspect leads officers on a chase through backyards. After dropping a bag of meth, a man swears hes only seen the drug on TV. A doped-up domestic violence suspect tries to claim self-defense.

programme.desc: Agents of the US Customs and Border Protection pursue a vehicle. Border agents spot two undocumented people while scanning train tracks. Airport Customs detains a man when agents suspect he might be carrying more than luggage.

programme.desc: An investigation involving two suspicious men in parked cars results in a foot chase and drug bust. An officer responds to a domestic call involving a threatening exhusband who is taken into custody. Officers in Florida question a deceptive and drug using couple.

programme.desc: Cops try desperately to get an unclothed man to cooperate. After a chase with a pickup truck, officers find a 14-year-old in the drivers seat. On a routine traffic stop, police contend with a plethora of dope and even more lies.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: Matt and Bruno bring in a Classic C10 that needs some handling upgrades with Control Arms and Tie Rod ends. They finish off the project with a custom sound system.

programme.title: Truck U

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: Time to learn about the Ram EcoDiesel. Well beef up the undercarriage and fill it with the right fluids for towing and then we bring in a Willys jeep for a Transmission repair.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: How do you get 37s to fit under the new Jeep JL. First, you install a massive lift kit to fit the tires, then beef up the front and rear gears to handle the new size and weight of the tires.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: Bruno takes a trip to San Antonio, Texas to meet the soldiers of Operation Comfort and see what makes their Bronco Weapons Carrier so special

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: One of the most frustrating things that can happen when you are building a project is finding out the parts you need are no longer available. This can usually bring the project to a screeching halt! But all is not lost because there is another option and Stacey walks you through the ins and outs of hunting for those elusive parts in a salvage yard. After that, its back to the shop where Stacey shows you how to restore those old, rag-tag parts that you find. Its auto recycling at its best, and with todays economy, its also a smart thing to do!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: The Rat Roaster is back!... and this wild little 32 Roadster gets even wilder as Stacey starts adding some cool details to lock it into the Hot Rod and Rock and Roll culture of 1969. A cool microphone shifter with a touch of James Bond, a bass drum kick pedal, bobbed fenders and a wild custom Gibson guitar to go with the car are just part of it. There is also a special appearance by legendary bass player, Billy Cox, as he talks about playing Woodstock with Jimi Hendrix. After that, Stacey gives you the low-down on the plasma cutter and why you need one. If you like shows that are laced with equal amounts of cool and history, then this episode of GEARZ is one you HAVE to see!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: Some of the biggest news to come down the automotive pipeline in a long time is the fact that Dodge is making the Challenger again. But how does it stack up against the legendary Challengers of old? Well, Stacey decides to find out! First, by grabbing a Challenger in a most unorthodox way and then comparing it head-to-head with a 70 440 six-pack car. But thats not all Then Stacey decides to take the new car beyond the legend by sticking on a supercharger and really blowing the doors off of the competition! If you are a Mopar nut, or have just wondered what all the fuss was about concerning the new Challengerthis is one show youve got to see!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: With the price of gas going up, down, and all over the place, people are becoming more and more concerned about fuel economy, and GEARZ is asked time and time again what products we recommend that really give you better economy and performance. Well, ask no morebecause Stacey not only addresses that question, but also goes through the top 6 upgrades that ANYBODY can do to a vehicle! Thats right; these are inexpensive AND easy to do! After that, Stacey takes on the subject of alternative fuels by demonstrating that you can actually make a diesel engine run, and run well, on old used cooking oil! Now there is yet another reason to eat French fries! So pass the ketchup and put the hammer down!!!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: Every once in a while, there comes a point in your project where there are no parts available to help you, and your only choice is to make something yourself but how do you do that? Stacey walks you through the steps of how to lay out an engine swap, and how to hand fabricate motor mounts, so you can stick an engine into a vehicle that it was never intended to go into. Its hard-core, down and dirty how-to, but somebody has to do it and it needs to be YOU. The good news is, with Stacey walking you through the process and showing you how to solve problems, it CAN be you! Now you just need to get out in the garage and start working!!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: Everybody knows that the engine is a central key component to ANY Hot Rod project. But is a V8 the only way to go? NO WAY! Stacey takes a vintage straight six engine that has been sleeping in a crate for almost 40 years and he puts on the right pieces. He shows you why the straight six was a force to be reckoned with in the early days of hot rodding. After that, Stacey jumps into the tips and tricks of how to paint your own true Kandy paint job. If you are into vintage Hot Rods, Kandy paint, and multi-carbs you dont need to go on a diet you just need to watch GearZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: The KnuckleBuster is back on GearZ, and Stacey is putting the final touches on this 73 Chevy pickup. After a quick look at the new paint slathered on its flanks, Stacey gives the truck a face lift with grille, bumpers, and all that other cool trim stuff. Then its on to the bed where he lays in some oak to give the former beater some class and style. Finally, its underneath to stick in a new exhaust system to keep the bad gas blowing out the back. If you have ever wondered if you could really build something cool yourself all you have to do is check out the finished KnuckleBuster and be willing to bust YOUR own knuckles the rest will take care of itself!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: POP QUIZ what are the 16 most influential cars ever made? If you answered Ford, Chevy, VW, Honda, or any other car manufacturer, you are closebut wrong! The 16 most influential cars ever made were the 16 original Hot Wheel cars that Mattel rolled out in 1968. Stacey walks you through the fascinating and unique story of how those little metal cars came to be and how they changed American car culture in a HUGE way. Young or old, you will love the story about the cars that turned living rooms across the country into huge racetracks. Matter-of-fact, well bet you not only remember these cars, but you probably owned a few of them over the years. So, dig out the toy box and put the chores on hold because its time to do some Hot Wheels racin!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: When it comes to off-road vehicles, more is usually better. This is especially true when tires are involved. Today on GEARZ, Stacey takes you through the nuts and bolts of one of the most incredible off-road vehicles ever builtthe Gamma Goat. What!?! Youve never heard of it? Well thats probably because you were not in the military. Because only the military could dream up an articulating, six-wheel-drive, amphibious monster like this, and still keep it street legal! After that, Stacey walks you through some important safety tips and tricks that you need to know if you are going to be welding in your shopso lock and load and strap in cuz its all coming at you today on GEARZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: Stacey goes where all of us have been before to pull an old derelict SEMI TRUCK(69 International) out of a quiet junkyard to demonstrate the steps necessary to get an old, neglected vehicle running again. From rats nests to chicken poop, its all here as Stacey slowly coaxes the old truck back to life. This show definitely drives the point home that if something like this can be revived, theres NOTHING that you should be afraid to tackle as long as you are armed with a set of tools and a sense of adventure! Go get em !

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: The Speed Racer Story and the Real Mach 5
programme.desc: Stacey digs into one of the most influential cars and cartoons in our history -- Speed Racer and the Mach 5. This show not only takes you thru the history of the cartoon, but also its cultural impact on multi-generations as well. But thats not all, Stacey manages to borrow the real Mach 5 and put it thru the paces against Racer X and other challengers. If youve never crossed the line between fact and fiction, real and imagined, we invite you to do it now with Stacey. GoSpeed RacerGo!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: Cash for Clunkers & Easy Upgrades for Fuel Economy
programme.desc: One of the most controversial things to come along recently was the Cash for Clunkers program, but do you really know the whole story? Well after this show of GEARZ you will! But Stacey doesnt just reveal the problems with the Cash for Clunker program, he also demonstrates real solutions available in the aftermarket to address the fuel mileage problem with simple upgrades that ANYBODY can do. If you are tired of feeling like a victim and are ready to do something about your vehicles performance and fuel economythis is the show to see!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: Aftermarket vs. OEM Parts Welding Techniques for Replacing Sheet Metal
programme.desc: Stacey answers some top questions from viewers as he compares OEM parts to their Aftermarket replacements. Which is the best quality? Which is the best deal? After you see this show, you will know the answer to those questions and a lot more. Then Stacey reveals the tips and techniques involved in welding in replacement sheet metal. If you never thought you could do this kind of major surgery yourself, this show will change your mind and encourage you to get out there and try it! So what are you waiting for? Get movin!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: 67 Mercury Cougar disassembly GMP Diecast story
programme.desc: So youve got a new project and you are dying to dig into it huh?..... Well, before you touch it, there are some tips and trick you ought to know before you blow it all apart and end up getting lost in a project you cant ever finish. Stacey shows you those tips and tricks as he rolls in a Classic 67 Mercury Cougar and starts methodically taking it apart to prepare it for some wild modifications down the road. If you are considering a project, or are already deep into one, you have got to see this show. Then we take an in depth look at the world of die cast models, as we put the spotlight on GMP and check out their incredible models. So whether you are into toy cars, miniature cars, or the real thing, this episode of GEARZ has something for everybody!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: Herobox 59 Ford Stepside Pickup - Welding Table
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in a 59 Ford Stepside Truck that is being built by the Herobox organization to help raise awareness for their goal of sending Heroboxes to all of our men and women serving in the Military. Its a great cause and a great truck and both need to be seen! The truck has already received a lot of modifications, but Stacey adds his special touch by installing custom wood in the bed, trying out a new roll-on bedliner, and sinking some cool 60s Corvette taillights into the rear fenders. If youve got an old truck and have been wondering how to bring the bed and fenders up a notch this show will definitely give you some ideas! After that, Stacey shows you just how important having the proper work table is, and the kind of things you can do if you have one. Its all about the tools its all about the techniques its all about GEARZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: If you ask any Gearhead what they dream about doing, being a Blue Angels Jet pilot or an Astronaut will be right at the top of the list. But what is really involved in being a pilot for the Blue Angels? Well today Stacey takes a look at the incredible history of the Blue Angels, and where they are today. Then as only GEARZ can do, Stacey takes you into the cockpit and allows you to experience first hand the incredible experience of flying with the Blue Angels. If sitting on top of thousands of horsepower and flipping inverted at the speed of sound sounds like fun to you then hold on, because you are in for the ride of your life! If youve ever wondered what it was like to be a part of the Blue Angels, and wondered if YOU could ever be a part of the team this is one show you cant miss!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: Project Heavy Metal & Duramax Diesel Engine Install/Drivetrain
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in that old International Cab over Truck, and starts a project called Heavy Metal. The project not only showcases people that work with their hands for a living, but also represents the Navys Blue Angels precision flying team. The first order up for business is to get some serious power into the truck and that involves Stacey stuffing a hot-rodded Duramax Diesel engine and Allison transmission into the old beast. If you have ever wondered what it takes to retro-fit a big diesel engine into a project, and if there are parts available to make it happen this show will not only answer those questions, but also encourage you to do it!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: Return of the Rat Roaster/Paint and Interior
programme.desc: ITS BACK!!! The Rat Roaster 32 Ford roadster rolls back into the GEARZ shop wearing a new coat of green paint and sporting a custom interior but how did it get that way? Simple, It went for a visit to the Hot Rod Institute in South Dakota, and Stacey takes you there too, as he shows you what makes this tech school so much different than all the others out there. Then Stacey continues putting the finishing touches on this hot 32 Ford roadster as it makes its way down the final stretch to completion. The baddest car in the valley in 1969 is about to come to life!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: The V8 Interceptor Front suspension on a 67 Mercury Cougar
programme.desc: One of the most popular cars of the Muscle car era the Mercury Cougar has been one of the most overlooked cars in recent decades. All of that changes as Stacey rolls in a solid 67 Cougar, dubs it the V8 Interceptor and begins to completely change the front suspension to get rid of the stock shock towers and turn this little old ladys car into a corner-carving, road-gripping beast. But wait!... you cant cut out the shock towers can you!?! Yes you can!... and Stacey goes in-depth on not only how to do it, but also the installation of a complete TCI independent front suspension. If you own or want to own a classic Mustang, Cougar, Fairlane, or other 60s Ford and have always wished you could get rid of those stock shock towers to get more room in the engine compartment, this is the show for you.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: V8 interceptor Boss 429 History - Boss Nine Engine and 6spd Transmission Install
programme.desc: Stacey takes a look at one of the most incredible engines that Ford ever built, the boss 429. But instead of leaving you WISHING you could have one, he shows you where you can actually GET one. the legendary Jon Kaase. After that he rolls the V8 Interceptor, Cougar back into the shop and gives you 780 reasons why this car is called the Interceptor. With all that new-found room under the hood. Stacey stuffs in a 520ci, 780 horsepower, Boss Nine engine and a 6speed manual transmission to back it up. If you didnt think modern performance parts would fit in a classic muscle car, this show proves they can! But theres more to it than that, its the rebirth of Fords hemi and finally an answer to all those Ford fans who have wondered what could have been if the Boss engine had continued. The Boss V8 Interceptor is in the house!!!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: V8 Interceptor Rear Suspension - West Coast Classic Cougar - Michigan Tech
programme.desc: Stacey rolls the V8 Interceptor/Cougar back into the shop and begins upgrading the rear end and rear suspension to handle all the massive power that has been stuffed under the hood. The parts are flyin as in goes a custom 3-link torque arm suspension, a 9 Ford rear end, and a tubular sub-frame to prevent the car from flexing. If you have a classic Mustang or Cougar, youre gonna want to see this! Then Stacey shows you where to get parts for your Mustang or Cougar project by paying a visit to a special salvage yard that specializes only inyou guessed itClassic Cougars! If youve ever wondered where to get those special parts.now you know. After that we take a trip to Michigan Tech to check out their amazing testing facilities and put some actual products to the test. Its all here. and its all GEARZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: Rat Roaster final assembly Cornwell tools history Exhaust tips/ Bends
programme.desc: One of the most exciting and time consuming parts of any project is the final assembly. This is where you bring it all together into a finished vehicle, and where attention to detail is so important. Today on GEARZ Stacey walks thru some of the things that need to be done on a project before you can actually call it done. Fuel system, electrical, driveshaft, these are all things that are easy to overlook and have a way of rearing their head to bite you at the end of a project. But with a little pre-planning and the right products, Stacey shows you how you can easily breeze downhill and to the finish line on a project, instead of crashing and burning so close to the finish line! After that we take a look at the amazing 90 year history of Cornwell tools and why they are considered the best kept secret in the tool world. Only on GEARZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: Hot Rod Of The Air: The Stearman PT-17/ Buffing headlights
programme.desc: We all know what a Hot Rod is right? Well today on GEARZ, Stacey pushes the boundaries of traditional Hot Rod thinking by showing you a vintage Hot Rod that FLIES! We dont mean down the road! If youve ever wondered what its like to build, restore, and fly a vintage biplane, then this is the show to see. Its exposed engine, open cockpit, wind-in-your-face cruising at its best! Then its back to the shop where Stacey deals with the classic problem facing drivers all across the country..dull hazy head light lenses. With a few simple tools and techniques, He quickly shows you how to make them as good as new, and save some serious cash and thatll have you singing I can see clearly now, the haze is gone Only on GEARZ!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: Discovering Bigfoot / Installing Smooth Door Handles / Using a Bead Roller
programme.desc: Today on GEARZ, Stacey finally puts an end to the controversy on all the Bigfoot sightings, and offers proof that Bigfoot does exist! And he lives in St. Louis! Sound crazy? Not really, because St. Louis is the home of Bob Chandler the mad genius behind the Bigfoot Monster Truck. On this special episode of GEARZ, Stacey rolls through the unique history of not only Bigfoot, but the whole Monster Truck genre. If youve ever wondered how these big, smoking, monstrous beasts came to roam the planet, then this is one history lesson you dont want to miss! After that, Stacey shows you how to get the best of both worlds by shaving the original door handles on a classic muscle car, and installing some smooth modern handles WITH A VINTAGE LOOK!! A perfect combination? WE think it is, but before YOU can vote, you have to see the show!!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: The V8 Interceptor: Nips, Tucks and 8 Stack
programme.desc: The V8 Interceptor is back! Stacey answers your questions by walking you through the fitment of that massive Boss 9, 520ci engine in the 67 Cougar. Headers, oil pan, master cylinders, are addressed, but the big surprise is what is going on top. Its an incredible 8-stack injection with the look and feel of a vintage Hilborne system, and the function and drive-ability of a modern electronic fuel injection. You have to see it to believe it, and when you do see it, you wont believe it! Then Stacey goes through some tips and tricks for your fuel system that will keep you running down the road, and not sitting on the side of it! Its all GEARZand its all here!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: Setting up the Ultimate Trailer Towing Tech
programme.desc: If theres one thing that every gearhead needs, its a trailer so you can drag more junk home! The problem is, most of us dont really put much thought into the set up of a trailer, and that can add up to some serious problems when you go to retrieve your prize. Today on GEARZ, Stacey walks you thru how to set up a simple trailer, so youll be ready to pull a rusted hulk out of a field, or pull a restoration from coast to coast. Compressed air, Winch, and auxiliary electric power are all things that you CAN take with you if you take the time to plan ahead and select the right equipment so it all works together. If you like to hunt for those forgotten treasures, a trailer is one tool youve got to have!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: Two of the biggest complaints that people have about the new Car manufacturers today, is that they dont build the cars and trucks people want, and what they do build is too expensive. Well, never fear because today on GEARZ, Stacey introduces the new Ram 1500 Express that has a 390 horsepower 5.7 Hemi in a short bed, regular cab truck, and an price tag that will have you rubbing your eyes and pinching yourself to see if it is true. Better yet, there is a huge aftermarket out there to help you build a one of a kind vehicle. In 1968, Plymouth stood the muscle car world on its ear with the incredible Road Runner. In 2011,Mopar has done it again with the Ram 1500 Expressand GEARZ has the very first one BEEPBEEP!!!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: When it comes to America, we all know who the founding Fathers are, and what their vision was for this Nation. When it comes to Hot Rodding, a lot of people have no idea who the founders are, and how this all got started. Today on GEARZ, Stacey gives you an up-close and personal look at the legendary, Speedy Bill Smith and the incredible world of Speedway Motors. Not only were they there from the beginning in the early 50s, but they are still on the cutting edge and pulse of the Hot Rodding world. How do they do it???? Youll have to watch and find out! After that, Stacey takes a look at the wild 68 Camaro that Cherry Bomb has put together, to serve as their new way to disturb the Peace. CRANK IT UP!!!!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: Its back! Its done!! AND its WILD! The Banshee comes full circle as Stacey walks you thru the complete buildup of this incredible V8 powered Miata, and then takes it out for a good flogging! If youve ever dreamed of owning a Cobra or Corvette, but you needed something more reliable and affordable, this is one project you have to check out! If youve always considered the Mazda Miata a girls caryou HAVE to check this out! If you think that its impossible to have a reliable car with power windows, Air conditioning, and a real working top, that is ALSO blisteringly FASTYOU HAVE TO CHECK THIS OUT! The best part is this is a car you can actually build and affordand thats what real Hot Rodding is all about!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: Stacey rolls the Ram 1500 Express back in the shop and starts to transform it into the DragN Wagon. Pulling on the legacy of the iconic Superbee, the Little Red Wagon wheelstander, and the current popularity of Dragon folklore, Stacey sets out to create a modern street machine from a lowly base pickup that anybody can afford. To get the rig to handle, a state-of-the-art air suspension is installed, along with massive brakes, and cool performance wheels and tires. One thing about this wagon..its going to handle!!!! After that, its off to the dyno to see what kind of difference a spark plug can make in the performance of your engine.

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in an old 67 Ford pickup that has been hacked on over the years, and shows how to get rid of the old afterthought floor shifter, and convert it to a column shift that will actually shift gears! After that, Stacey digs into one of the newest fuel injection units on the market and shows how easy it is to install, and then demonstrates how to shave the drip rail off of your muscle car. Finally, we answer the question: Is it possible to put chrome plating on aluminum or stainless steel? We take a trip to Advance plating in Nashville to find out. Theres so much stuff going on, youre gonna need to watch this show twice!

programme.title: Stacey David's Gearz
programme.sub-title: Breathing Fire into the DragNWagon The New Face of Slot Cars/Carrera
programme.desc: Today on GEARZ, Stacey brings back the DragNWagon to see if he can get the beast to breathe some fire! The first thing he puts on is an ATI supercharger system to get some air sucking in. Then adds some hotter coils to help light the flameand finally slaps on a bigger exhaust system to help blow the air out. If you are wondering how to make a street beast out of an entry level truck, this show spells it out. Then its on to the world of slot cars, as Stacey explores the past, present, and future of the little motorized miniatures that helped shape the gearhead world as we know it and introduces you to Carrera slot cars.

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the case of Linda Cooney, a woman who became the center of attention in two shootings - two decades apart - both with the same gun.

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the disappearance and death of Yvonne Baldelli, a California woman who moved to Panama with her boyfriend Brian Brimager, an ex-Marine , who turned out not to be as perfect to her as he seemed.

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.desc: Suzanne insists that everyone in the family tell the truth at all times after she catches Nick in a lie.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The dancers get a chance to showcase their unique talents during show group auditions, and Kelli and Judy deliberate with guest judges to select the elite squad.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The dancers test their ability to think on their toes during a series of mock-press interviews, and as auditions wind down, a shocking bit of news shakes up the process for Kelli and Judy.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli and Judy make cuts via video chat after a positive test for COVID-19 halts camp, Charlotte Jones hands out the iconic uniforms, and the team performs its game-day entrance.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As 51 rookies and veterans arrive to chase their dreams, the candidates hope to prove their talent with a standout solo performance and take on the kick line in the Judges' Showcase.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Melissa Rycroft comes to the first rehearsal to see which newbies have showmanship, DCC alum Natalie Woods hosts a rookie at her home, and Kelli and Judy make the first cuts of the season.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The 47 hopefuls learn the mechanics of the kickline, a rookie's injuries put her out of commission, and choreographer Evan Miller teaches a dance routine that calls for power and precision.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With nine cuts looming before the team's first game, the hopefuls show off their freestyle dancing, get fit for their official uniforms and learn new choreography from Denise Dicharry.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Choreographer Criscilla Anderson uses her cancer battle to inspire the dancers, veteran mentors offer style tips to the rookies, and Travis Wall helps Judy and Kelli make their next cut.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The hopefuls practice the highly precise entrance routine and jump kicks for the first time, Jordann shares a vulnerable personal story, and Judy and Kelli make two more tough cuts.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As the remaining ladies try out for the media-savvy Show Group, Judy and Kelli are faced with yet another difficult decision, and some dancers rise to glory while others' hearts are broken.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Makeovers give the dancers renewed confidence, alum Yuko shares exciting personal news, veteran Lisa makes a hard decision, and Kelli questions Alora-Rose about a rumored distraction.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Week nine of training camp intensifies when Kelli and Judy confront Alora-Rose and deliberate squad dismissal decisions one week before the first game of the season.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli and Judy slyly make the final squad announcement, and the new team faces several obstacles before taking the field for their first game as Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Over 600 excited and anxious Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders hopefuls arrive at Texas Stadium for the preliminary auditions.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: In the finals audition, the competition really heats up. Now, surviving candidates must go head-to-head against experienced veteran cheerleaders for a coveted spot in the DCC Training Camp.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Training Camp begins! The newly elected training camp candidates are excited, even star-struck, as they meet the veterans for the first time at Valley Ranch.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The group competes in a grueling army fitness test to try and earn the privilege of being on the elite "Power Squad." At that evening's rehearsal, the first cuts will be made.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The rookies are given "makeovers" to transform them into the image of a DCC.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The entire squad needs a wake-up call and guest choreographer Kitty Carter gives it to them.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The final dance rehearsal of week 7 has a surprise guest judge who puts everyone on edge. Ultimately, in Kelli's office, the tears flow as some dreams surprisingly come to an end.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Join 65,000 screaming Cowboys fans as the cheerleaders hit the turf and wow the entire stadium and themselves during their first Dallas Cowboys football game of the season.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: For a television show, the Fonz sets a record by jumping his motorcycle over fourteen garbage cans. He ends up crashing into Arnold's chicken stand, and while recuperating from a broken leg, upsets the regimen of the Cunningham household.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: To raise money for the big football game, the boys decide to start their own babysitting service. In Football Frolics, Richie, Potsie, and Ralph have their hopes set on seeing the big football game of the year, but tickets can't be found anywhere.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: When Fonzie sets a pigeon coop atop the Cunningham garage and the roof caves, Mr. Cunningham sues to collect damages. In Two Angry Men, Laverne and Shirley prevail upon Fonzie to care for a coop of pigeons.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Lavernes dad and her pals pitch in to help her face her despair when Shirley moves out after leaving a short farewell note.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Laverne meets up with the space age and a very spaced-out character, as she unleashes space-age havoc in her new job.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Laverne tries to restore her new boyfriends self-confidence after he fails to stand up to some tough guys.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Laverne swings into action when she believes the man she's been datinga former trapeze artistis out to kill her.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Laverne pretends to be a woman with-child in order to help her pregnant friend win prizes in a contest for mothers-to-be.

programme.sub-title: Putting the Ork Back In Mork (Part 2)
programme.desc: It could be Mork's last night on Earth when an ancient Orkan elder who looks like a ten-year-old boy arrives with the news that Mork must return to Ork for forecycling because he has picked up too many Earthly ways.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: With Mindy depressed about not getting a scholarship, it's up to Mork to stir up some laughs, so he brings home a friend who claims to be the real Peter Pan, with the power to fly as just one of his magical talents.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: It's the biggest, funniest roller marathon ever when Mork takes to skates for the first time to race a cheating champion skater down a Rocky Mountain peak into Boulder to save the day care center at which he works from destruction.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Spaceman Mork gets so cosmically carried away with pulling practical jokes that he surprises Mindy by assembling her jeep in their living room right over Mr. Bickley's apartment - with disastrous results.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mork turns the apartment he shares with Mindy into a hilarious hideaway for a young chimpanzee that he kidnaps from the Boulder zoo in the mistaken belief that the animal's mother has been abducted.

programme.desc: Richie lets fame go to his head when he takes a turn as a disc jockey at the local radio station.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The Jersey Shore crew heads to Miami! Angelina arrives and the drama quickly picks up where it left off in Seaside. Tension is high between Ron and Sam and she is left brokenhearted while he gets crazy at the club.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Sammi tries to figure out what Ronnie REALLY did at the club the night before, but no one is saying. And when Angelina interrupts Pauly's game, we see a whole new side of the usually calm Pauly D.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Angelina swallows her pride and apologizes to the girls. Back at the house, Mike, Vinny, and Pauly have a close encounter with grenades in the hot tub, while Ron continues to creep behind Sammi's back.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Ron's bad behavior puts Snooki, Angelina, and Jwoww in a tough spot. Together the girls decide to write an anonymous letter to Sammi and finally reveal the entire truth.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Sammi finds Snooki and Jenni's anonymous letter, and this time it's really over with Ronnie -- at least for now. Meanwhile, Mike, Vinny, and Pauly (MVP) have their hands full juggling four girls in one night.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The anonymous note causes tension between the girls, culminating in a full-blown cat-fight. After spending another night in bed with Vinny, Snooki reveals a not-so-little-known fact about her pinkeye-prone cuddle-buddy.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The roommates deal with the fallout from the girl-fight; Angelina starts dating Jose, a guy from the club; and Jenni and Snooki don homemade hazmat suits to clean up the smush room in preparation for Snooki's hook-up.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: When news gets out that Angelina and Vinny hooked up, Mike threatens to spill the beans to the Jose. Vinny's family comes to visit. And Vinny and Pauly find the girls of their dreams, but one of their hearts will be broken.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Things go south for Angelina when the house learns she slept with Jose after smushing Vin. Then she gets too close to a guy Snooki hooked up with. But it's the last straw when Mike discovers more unpleasantness in the bathroom.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Mike reunites with his Canadian hottie, providing entertainment for the whole house. And Angelina tells her roommates how she really feels about them, sending Snooki into a frenzy and finally pushing things over the edge.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Vinny decides between two sets of girls. And with Angelina gone, Snooki thinks it's time that she and Jenni bury the hatchet with Sam. But Snooki's happiness is short-lived as Mike becomes increasingly belligerent with her.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Everyone is frustrated with Mike for being off his game - he gets the roommates kicked out of a club, gets the car towed, practically burns down the house, and proves to be a failure as a wingman for Pauly. Twice!

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Pauly and Vin each have a final date with their Miami girls, while Sam and Ron's last supper quickly devolves into a fight. Then Jenni stirs things up between Pauly and Mike, leading to a drama-filled final night in the hot tub.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The cast of the Jersey Shore are back together to dish the dirt on Miami. From bromance and romance to the infamous note and the fights that followed, the cast tells all.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: With Angelina gone, Snooki brings her friend Deena to the Shore for the summer. The tension between the girls from Miami finally explodes as fists and extensions go flying on their first night in the house.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.sub-title: It's Gonna Be An Interesting Summer
programme.desc: The fight between Sammi and Jwoww causes tension in the house. Ronnie and Sammi continue to isolate themselves. When Ronnie finally decides to hang out and have fun with the rest of the house, Sammi feels all alone.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Sammi decides to make peace with Snooki and Deena. Jwoww runs into her old flame Roger and sparks fly. And Snooki gets arrested for public intoxication.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Steve puts on a rubber mask to observe Jess at her first broker's open house; Fredrik follows a lead for his Tribeca listing; Ryan lands a beautifully renovated loft in Chelsea.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Ryan bets a Chelsea loft commission on a table tennis match; Steve's girlfriend settles into their new home together; Fredrik thinks his Crosby listing's massive terrace could be perfect for trained pets; a new, up-and-coming agent joins the crew.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Ryan interviews young agents for his new rental team; Steve and a childhood friend hit the gym to weigh all the investment properties they've seen; Tyler invites a famous mentalist to his Mercantile open house party; Fredrik hosts an open house.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Fredrik hustles for offers at his disco-themed open house; Steve hosts a book launching event at his open house; Tyler faces off with Ryan over a listing for a massive loft on Laight Street.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Steve works to install an elevator in his new listing; Tyler gets a wake-up call while hosting a morning open house; Fredrik's husband's love of New York turns chilling during a raging snowstorm; Ryan re-brands a nameless neighborhood.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Ryan invites an illusionist to his open house; L.A. agent Josh Altman isn't thrilled that Fredrik is building a West Coast team; Steve's in a professional pickle; Tyler plans a horse carriage ride through Central Park for potential buyers.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Ryan premieres a music video for his Tribeca loft; Tyler pitches the biggest listing of his career; Fredrik and Derek tour a rental home for themselves in Los Angeles, but local brokers don't give them a warm welcome; Steve gets blind-sided.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Fredrik has a run-in with L.A. agent Heather Altman at his open house; Ryan markets a beautiful Park Avenue apartment to mysterious buyers from a secret government; Steve realizes decisions at home are easier to make than decisions with developers.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Fredrik lands a prime listing in SoHo that everyone, except Tyler, says is amazing; Steve asks Jess to help with a Bedford-Stuyvesant listing, but their contrasting selling styles may sink the deal; a seller steers Ryan towards hiring Luis.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing New York
programme.desc: Ryan and Luis host a dinner party to sell their listing but struggle to rein in Ramona Singer; Fredrik's listing isn't big enough to satisfy his buyer's needs, so he tries to sell her a different unit, even if it's one he doesn't represent.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh lists a Beverly Hills mansion but has problems with the buyer; Chad lists a million-dollar home; Madison lists a Malibu estate.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh lists a plot of land in a golf course while simultaneously trying to make a deal in Bel Air; Chad lists a home in LA's "Golden Triangle."

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: Dolphins, Rats and Next Door Neighbors
programme.desc: Chad and Madison are invited to speak at a real estate conference; Chad lists a bungalow plagued with problems; Josh lists a mansion on Newport Coast.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: Jumping Through Hoops for a Signature
programme.desc: Josh must travel to Montana to get an ocean view listing in Malibu; Madison hunts for investment properties.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Chad snatches one of Madison's former multi-million dollar listings; Madison takes on a Malibu listing; Josh makes a spur-of-the-moment gamble.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: Sweet Deals and Icing on the Cake
programme.desc: Josh wants to move a home using its views; Madison convinces a friend to lease a home, rather than sell; Chad struggles to balance work and Victoria.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh lists Dr. Sam's house; Chad wins a listing for a Hollywood condo; Victoria gives Chad a surprising gift; Madison searches for a home for a retiree.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh agrees to a co-listing; Chad worries that Madison is moving in on his territory; Madison puts a dream home on the market.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh tries to move a half-demolished home in Beverly Hills; Chad thinks he is listing a house for a friend; Madison picks up a dream client.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Overbuilt mansion in a modest neighborhood; an angry seller is promised an easy sell.

programme.desc: Supplies go missing from Hilltop; Negan is idolized by an Alexandrian; Ezekiel holds a secret.

programme.desc: Carol and Daryl go on a mission together while Siddiq struggles to solve a mystery.

programme.desc: Carol pushes boundaries that make Daryl uncomfortable; Alpha and Beta have reservations about someone.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A fight causes tensions in Oceanside while the Alexandrians set out on a high-stakes mission.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group must figure out how to get out of a precarious situation.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group must defend Alexandria from a threatening outside force.

programme.desc: The Whisperers are coming for Hilltop; after Daryl and Lydia's encounter with Alpha, the communities must decide whether to run or fight; Eugene's communication with Stephanie gets complicated.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Michonne takes Virgil back to his mysterious island to reunite with his family; in exchange, Virgil promises weapons that could change the tide of the Whisperer War.

programme.desc: With Negan's help, Alpha and the Whisperers attack Hilltop.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.desc: Beta engages the final battle of the Whisperer War.

programme.desc: Maggie returns, to the dismay of Negan; the trials she endured since leaving have made her harder in order for her and her son to survive; Daryl and Maggie unexpectedly fight an unseen and unknown threat.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl and Carol find an old cabin that takes Daryl back to his years away from the group after Rick disappeared; he relives the painful memory of meeting a reticent survivor and the toxic events that amplified his relationship with Dog.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: With Maggie's map, Gabriel and Aaron search for food and supplies to bring back to Alexandria; checking out one more location, they chance upon a stash; faith is broken and optimism is fragmented when they are put to the ultimate test.

programme.desc: Restoration of the 1887 Victorian in Glen Ridge, NJ, is complete. The crew gets a tour.

programme.title: Flying Over Iceland
programme.desc: "Flying Over Iceland: Part I" provides a soothing aerial journey through eastern Iceland's fjords and valleys, starting at sunrise in Brei_dalsvik. programme.title: Flying Over Iceland 2
programme.desc: "Flying Over Iceland II: Summer in the Golden Circle" presents a serene aerial view of Iceland's south coast, starting at Skogafoss and moving to Vik, with black sand beaches, cliffs, and Vatnajkull glacier. Filmed in 2020, this 1-hour film features local wildlife and immersive music.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Raymond Blanc creates four mouth-watering chocolate recipes: a simple mousse, rich chocolate delice, fondant with a melting middle, and his signature dessert: cafe creme, which is a chocolate-sculpted cup filled with a mousse and coffee sabayon.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Raymond dives into the world of fish with the underused and affordable mackerel; he creates a light meal of grilled mackerel with a soy lime dressing.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Raymond Blanc looks to the UK's favorite fruit, apples, for inspiration; he returns to memories of childhood with a simple tart made with a foolproof pastry and custard filling.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Blanc celebrates the season with a winter vegetable salad featuring beetroots, a celeriac puree served with a crisp-skinned roast wild duck with blackberry sauce and watercress soup.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Blanc celebrates the season with a winter vegetable salad featuring beetroots, a celeriac puree served with a crisp-skinned roast wild duck with blackberry sauce and watercress soup.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Blanc uses two seasonal ingredients, game and mushrooms, to create a French version of a pasty called pithivier, which is filled with a rich mix of pheasant, chestnuts and dried fruits; he also makes a cep mushroom tortellini with fresh pasta.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: The miracle of yeast helps Raymond to create a French classic: brioche; he gets down to basics with a French country bread recipe that's essential for any baker to add to their repertoire; lastly, he makes a spectacular apple croustade.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Raymond Blanc combines the universally popular ingredients of egg and cheese to make a classic omelette with a secret technique; he then uses a Comte from his home region in France to make a family-style souffle.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Blanc focuses on tomatoes, opening with a simple salad recipe inspired by his mother; he also makes a creamy risotto, stuffed tomatoes glazed with cheese and a series of ices and sorbets to cleanse the palate with elegance.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Blanc celebrates the best of British shellfish as he cooks dishes including Moules Mariniere, seared squid salad and Scottish lobster.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Raymond begins with a feather-light lemon tea cake, coated in an apricot jam and tangy lemon glaze; he also makes a choux pastry filled with chocolate cream and covered with a chocolate icing; lastly, the secrets to the perfect macarons.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Blanc shares his favorite lamb dishes: lamb liver with caramelized potatoes and French seasoning, a slow-roasted garlic and herb lamb shoulder with potato and turnip gratin and lamb provencal with ratatouille.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Raymond celebrates his passion for puddings, cooking dishes including riz au lait, tarte tatin and fruit crumble.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Raymond shares his love of charcuterie, beginning with thin slices of duck cured in herbs and juniper berries; also, he makes a chicken liver parfait and a meaty pot-au-feu medley; lastly, a ham hock terrine served with home-made pickles.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Drawing upon his travels through Asia, Raymond creates dishes full of fragrant spice and fiery heat.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Raymond demonstrates the versatility of the summer's juiciest fruits with a simple but impressive berry-strewn pavlova and a spicy cherry clafloutis sees the vibrant fruit cushioned in a bed of soft, sumptuous pastry.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: Raymond demonstrates the versatility of the summer's juiciest fruits with a simple but impressive berry-strewn pavlova and a spicy cherry clafloutis sees the vibrant fruit cushioned in a bed of soft, sumptuous pastry.

programme.sub-title: Hot Rod History Lessons - Christmas Trees and Funny Cars

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.sub-title: Hot Rod History Lessons - Hollywood Movie Day

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.sub-title: Hot Rod History Lessons - Land Speed Records

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: Professor Jay Deez III takes us into the world of custom culture and the history of coachbuilders; people that introduced us to the Winfield Fade and even the Batmobile.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.sub-title: Hot Rod History Lessons - Brotherhood of Street Racers
programme.desc: The unbelievable story of how Big Willie Robinson and illegal street racing brought Los Angeles together. Racing with gangs, riots, cops, and mayors, this one has it all as told from the men who were there.

programme.sub-title: Drive the Globe, Utah Dual Sport Ride, Alaska Trek Preview

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.sub-title: Overland Expo, Crater Lake, Opus OP15 Trailer
programme.desc: The team travels to Oregon for the Bend Overland Expo and visits places like Crater Lake National Park; testing the Opus OP15 off-road trailer which sleeps four and has a full outdoor kitchen and solar power to live off-grid.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.sub-title: Whistler Mountain Biking, Toyota Tundra Build
programme.desc: Traveling to Whistler Canada to go mountain biking at North America's premiere mountain bike Park and going four wheeling; an inside look at project Toyota Tundra build for overlanding.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.sub-title: Dog Sledding in Alaska, Toyota 4Runner Build
programme.desc: Hitting Alaska to go four wheeling, helicopter to a glacier to go dog sledding, then trying ziplining and taking a train ride; building a used 2017 Toyota 4Runner for overlanding, and showing why this SUV is so popular.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.sub-title: Montana Off-Roading, Glacier NP, Nobo 16.6 Trailer

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.sub-title: Yellowstone NP, Vintage Trailer Works, Wired by Greg

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.sub-title: Off-Road Travel TV -- Utah Off-Road, Swingarm City, Cathedral Valley, Monument Valley
programme.desc: The team tackles extreme terrain in Utah before breaking down and heading back to California for some quick repairs; we return to Utah with a new crew and hit infamous places like Swingarm City, Cathedral Valley, Monument Valley and more.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.sub-title: Off-Road Travel TV -- Ghost Towns, Ford Bronco Raptor Build, Alaska Highlights

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: Uncover where synthetic oil actually came from; we're exploring a fighter jet pilot's path to pursue his vision to of how a jet fighter pilot pursued his vision to create a high-performing engine oil for automotive use.

programme.title: The Bassquatch Hunter Fish Out of Water
programme.desc: Kayak Fishing vs. Bus Driver Mike takes out Ebonie from the Toledo Public School system. Ebonie catches her very first fish and learns why fishing is so addictive. Then Mike learns to drive a bus and helps throw an appreciation party!

programme.title: Carolina All Out
programme.desc: Early spring crappie in North Carolina can be hard to nail down as they're in transition from deep water to shallower brush piles. Chris teams up with Kyle Farwell of Farwell Fishing Guide Service to target big slabs with forward facing sonar.

programme.title: Fly Rod Chronicles
programme.sub-title: Sailfish On The Fly in Guatemala Pt. 1
programme.desc: Curtis and his family travel to the world-renowned Casa Vieja Lodge in Guatemala to catch sailfish on the fly. Captain/Owner David Salazar and his crew put us on multiple sailfish a day and made sure this was a family tip of a lifetime.

programme.title: Lindner's Angling Edge
programme.sub-title: Amazing Lake Sakakawea in North Dakota
programme.desc: Lake Sakakawea in North Dakota is a top destination for multispecies anglers. Here, Al Lindner and Ty Sjodin focus on catching walleyes and smallmouth bass.

programme.title: Skeeter Bass Champs
programme.desc: The Skeeter Bass Champs Team Tournament trail is headed back to Sam Rayburn for Stop #3 and this time the weather conditions are much more favorable than last time!

programme.title: Fishing And Hunting Texas
programme.sub-title: Crappie Fishing in Kerrville and Bass Fishing on Inks Lake
programme.desc: Texas is well known for a variety of destinations to wet a line and go fishing and in this episode the Fishing & Hunting Texas team goes fishing from the Hill Country of Texas for crappie and bass and then journeys to North Texas.

programme.title: Bass Pro Shop's Fisherman's Handbook
programme.sub-title: Slowing Down to Sight Fish for Bass
programme.desc: Temperatures are increasing, and a majority of the population of bass in a fishery are moving shallow to spawn. These conditions are great to catch bass while sight fishing. Wade Middleton details why to slow down when sight fishing for bass.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Whether you're hunting 10 acres or 1,000, how you handle boundaries, buck movement, and communication with neighboring hunters can make or break your season. The team shares real-world scenarios and proven strategies to foster cooperation.

programme.desc: Jamie takes root veg to another level, makes scrumptious sticky BBQ chicken and turns things upside down with a pineapple cake.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver's 5 Ingredient Mediterranean Meals

programme.title: Jamie Oliver's 5 Ingredient Mediterranean Meals

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons

programme.desc: Jamie cooks a roast chicken with eggplant, bakes feta with figs & prosciutto, and creates a runner bean stew with fish. He shares tips for storing berries and chiles, finishing with a stunning pear tarte tatin.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: Andalusia, now crossed by high-speed and modernized rail lines, unveils its rich culture and landscapes; along the journey, we visit cities like Seville, Granada with its famed Alhambra and Guadix near the Tabernas desert.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
